Package hm.binkley.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Converter.Conversion<T,E extends Exception>
    Converts a string property value into a typed object.
    Mixin
    Mixin implements concrete class mixins via JDK proxies.
    XPropsConverter.Conversion<T,E extends Exception>
    Converts a string property value into a typed object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arrays
    Arrays holds simple functions for working with arrays.
    Converter
    Converter is the opposite of toString().
    InterfaceInstance
    InterfaceInstance needs documentation.
    LinkedIterable<T>
    LinkedIterable is a read-only iterable facade over a linked series of values defined by a head value and traversal and termination functions.
    Lists
    Lists has methods on java.util.Listl
    Notices<E extends Exception>
    Notices is one possible implementation for Martin Fowler's suggestion, Replacing Throwing Exceptions with Notification in Validations.
    OrderedProperties
    OrderedProperties is a JDK Properties with a defined ordering.
    StackTraceFocuser<E extends Throwable>
    StackTraceFocuser narrows exception stack traces, discarding uniteresting frames as an aid to logging or debugging.
    XProperties
    XProperties is a java.util.Properties supporting inclusion of other properties files, parameter substition and typed return values.
    XPropsConverter
    XPropsConverter needs documentation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OrderedProperties.Ordering
    Key ordering for JDK properties.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Bug
    Bug represents "impossible" coding mistakes or conditions.
    Converter.DuplicateConversion  
    Converter.UnsupportedConversion  
    XProperties.FailedConversionException
    Thrown if a property value cannot be converted to a typed instance.
    XProperties.MissingPropertyException
    Thrown if a property cannot be found.
    XProperties.RecursiveIncludeException
    Thrown if a set of x-properties recursively includes itself by incusion of another set of properties.
    XPropsConverter.DuplicateConversionException
    Duplicate key registered with XPropsConverter.
